Projects

All the following projects have been recognized at International Science, Engineering, or Sustainability compeitions.
Hover over the images to learn more.

Low Cost Sense and Avoid for Aircraft (LCSAA)

Improving Aviation Safety using Low-Cost Low-Fidelity Sensors Augmented with Extended Kalman Filters to Develop an Accurate Sense-and-Track System

PowerOff

An Arduino based counter using low-power dual laser tripwire system to reduce electricity wastage

iMrs

Immediate Medical Response System for automatically identifying, diagnosing, and responding to Medical Emergencies

Trash Terminators

Reduction of cafeteria waste by 15% by implementing advanced recycling program in School District

Trash Terminators 2.0

Reduction of cafeteria waste by 80% by implementing composting program in School District
